meanings.sent1: The unbelieving child refused to accept the magic trick.
meanings.sent2: She looked at the unbelievable story with an unbelieving expression.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave an unbelieving stare at the disappearing treat.
meanings.sent4: His unbelieving eyes widened as he saw the flying pig.
meanings.sent5: The unbelieving crowd gasped in amazement at the levitating magician.

meanings.sent1: The unbelieving student questioned the validity of the theory.
meanings.sent2: Her unbelieving tone made it clear she was not convinced.
meanings.sent3: The dog gave an unbelieving bark at the talking parrot.
meanings.sent4: His unbelieving expression mirrored his disbelief in the ghost story.
meanings.sent5: The unbelieving scientist raised an eyebrow at the outlandish claim.
